items.sentence: I wish I could play the guitar as well as Tom does.
I wish I could speak French half as well as you do.
I wish I had asked Tom for advice before I started.
I wish I had enough money to buy a house like that.
Tom needs someone he can discuss his problems with.
Tom never allowed Mary to see what was in his safe.
Tom offered to feed my cat while I was out of town.
Tom ordered beer for himself and red wine for Mary.
Tom said he didn\'t want to go to the park with us.
Why do you think Tom prefers living in the country?
There are some stores that\'ll give you a discount.
Can you at least pretend you\'re enjoying yourself?
I still have three months till I get out of prison.
I\'m sure we can figure out a way to get this done.
Tom doesn\'t want to hear anything Mary has to say.
Tom doesn\'t want to hear anything more about Mary.
Tom doesn\'t want to spend any more time in Boston.
I don\'t want to make the same mistakes over again.
I don\'t want to work at a supermarket all my life.
I get the feeling you don\'t really want me to win.
I\'m afraid we\'ve fallen a bit behind in our work.
I\'m fairly sure Tom hasn\'t done his homework yet.
You can\'t reason with someone who is unreasonable.
After killing Tom, Mary escaped through the window.
Being too nervous to reply, he stared at the floor.
Tom has already told me he isn\'t going to do that.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want to see Mary.
Tom definitely has the confidence to be our leader.
Tom denied that he had been involved in the affair.
Tom did acknowledge that he was pretty competitive.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been released from prison.
I used to have a job as a security guard at a bank.
I used to sleep for only three or four hours a day.
I usually sleep with my windows open in the summer.
I\'ll bet you looked beautiful when you were young.
There\'s only space for ten people in the lifeboat.
Tom said he had something important to say to Mary.
Tom said he had to tell someone about his problems.
Tom said he hoped he never needed to do that again.
It was clear that Tom didn\'t want to talk to Mary.
You shouldn\'t make jokes at the expense of others.
Tom got into the car with Mary and they drove away.
Tom got up early in order to catch the first train.
Tom grabbed a knife, an onion and a chopping board.
I didn\'t think Tom would show up at Mary\'s party.
I think you\'ll regret it if you don\'t go with us.
I can\'t make it to the hospital without some help.
I can\'t remember the last time I saw Tom so happy.
I can\'t speak French without making some mistakes.
Tom\'s home and office were searched by the police.
